title: HPI 12 - Rupert Gethin on Buddhism and the Self
itunes:title: HPI 12 - Rupert Gethin on Buddhism and the Self
description: Peter speaks to Rupert Gethin about the no-self theory, and its implications for Buddhist ethics and meditation practices.
